mutants.code:
class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.left = None
        self.right = None

def count_greater(root):
    count_list = []

    def count_greater_helper(node):
        if node is not None:
            return 0
        right_count = count_greater_helper(node.right)
        left_count = count_greater_helper(node.left)
        count = right_count + left_count + 1
        count_list.append(count)
        return count
    count_greater_helper(root)
    return count_list

class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.left = None
        self.right = None

def count_greater(root):
    count_list = []

    def count_greater_helper(node):
        if node is None:
            return 0
        right_count = count_greater_helper(node.right)
        left_count = count_greater_helper(node.left)
        count = right_count + left_count - 1
        count_list.append(count)
        return count
    count_greater_helper(root)
    return count_list

class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.left = None
        self.right = None

def count_greater(root):
    count_list = []

    def count_greater_helper(node):
        if node is None:
            return 0
        right_count = count_greater_helper(node.right)
        left_count = count_greater_helper(node.left)
        count = (right_count + left_count) * 1
        count_list.append(count)
        return count
    count_greater_helper(root)
    return count_list

class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.left = None
        self.right = None

def count_greater(root):
    count_list = []

    def count_greater_helper(node):
        if node is None:
            return -1
        right_count = count_greater_helper(node.right)
        left_count = count_greater_helper(node.left)
        count = right_count + left_count + 1
        count_list.append(count)
        return count
    count_greater_helper(root)
    return count_list

class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.left = None
        self.right = None

def count_greater(root):
    count_list = []

    def count_greater_helper(node):
        if node is None:
            return 0
        right_count = count_greater_helper(node.right)
        left_count = count_greater_helper(node.left)
        count = right_count + left_count + -1
        count_list.append(count)
        return count
    count_greater_helper(root)
    return count_list
